types1:Item.types1:Name: SP-SERVICENOW-ALLTRANSACTIONTYPE
types1:Item.types1:Description: Process to send incident information with all transaction type from DXC to SNOW.

process.name: SP-SERVICENOW-ALLTRANSACTIONTYPE
process.description: Process to send incident information with all transaction type from DXC to SNOW.

operation.expression: if ($input.IN_DXC/*:MessageHeader/*:TransactionType/text()='4') then 'INSERT' else if ($input.IN_DXC/*:MessageHeader/*:TransactionType/text()='12') then 'ACK' else if ($input.IN_DXC/*:MessageHeader/*:TransactionType/text()='8') then 'RESOLVE' else if ($input.IN_DXC/*:MessageHeader/*:TransactionType/text()='10') then 'UPDATE' else if ($input.IN_DXC/*:MessageHeader/*:TransactionType/text()='0') then 'CANCEL' else if ($input.IN_DXC/*:MessageHeader/*:TransactionType/text()='1') then 'CLOSE' else if ($input.IN_DXC/*:MessageHeader/*:TransactionType/text()='10' and $input.IN_DXC/*:MessageHeader/*:TransactionSubType/text()='REOPEN' ) then 'REOPEN' else ''

if ($temp.temp_incidentstatus='open') then 'New' else if ($temp.temp_incidentstatus='assigned') then 'Assigned' else if ($temp.temp_incidentstatus='work_in_progress') then 'In Progress' else if ($temp.temp_incidentstatus='pending_customer' ) then 'On hold' else if ($temp.temp_incidentstatus='resolved' and $temp.temp_completioncode != 'Void') then 'Resolved' else if ($temp.temp_incidentstatus='closed' ) then 'Closed' else if ($temp.temp_completioncode ='Void' ) then 'Cancelled' else ''
if ($temp.temp_Priority='critical') then '1' else if ($temp.temp_Priority='high') then '2' else if ($temp.temp_Priority='average') then '3' else if ($temp.temp_Priority='low' ) then '4' else ''
if ($temp.temp_Priority='critical') then '1' else if ($temp.temp_Priority='high') then '2' else if ($temp.temp_Priority='average') then '2' else if ($temp.temp_Priority='low' ) then '3' else ''
if ($temp.temp_Priority='critical') then '1' else if ($temp.temp_Priority='high') then '1' else if ($temp.temp_Priority='average') then '2' else if ($temp.temp_Priority='low' ) then '3' else ''

if ((xs:string(fn:contains($temp.temp_completioncode,'Advice')))='true') then 'Informed/Advised' else if ($temp.temp_completioncode='No user response') then 'No Customer Response' else if ($temp.temp_completioncode='change') then 'Future Enhancement' else $temp.temp_completioncode

if ($temp.temp_hasAssignmentWorkGroupPartyName ='E-INCFLS-GDO-GCS-UX') then 'IT-Hosting-MEU-GCS-UX-L1-DxC' else if ($temp.temp_hasAssignmentWorkGroupPartyName ='E-INCSSP-GDO-GCS-UX') then ='W-INCSSP-KRFG-APPSUPT-ORCATFIN-SX' ) then 'IT-SAP-NA-RTR-FinanceControlling' else ''
